---
category: news
title: "Bentley-Gallup Research Shows that Three in Four Americans Believe AI Will Reduce Jobs"
excerpt: "WALTHAM, Mass., Sept. 14, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- Most Americans think artificial intelligence (AI) will negatively affect the U.S. job market, with 75% saying it will decrease the total number of jobs over the next 10 years. About one in five (19%) believe AI will not affect the number of jobs, while 6% say it will result in an increase in jobs."
